          <title>
            <string language="sl">Delovanje 4-taktnega motorja</string>
            <string language="en">Animation of four-stroke engine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Animation der Viertaktmaschine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Animation de moteur à quatre temps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Animation do motor four-stroke</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Animazione del motore a quattro tempi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωτικότητα της four-stroke μηχανής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Animación del motor de cuatro tiempos</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Animacija je izdelana v Flashu. Predhodno je potrebno naložiti Flash-player (macromedia.com)</string>
            <string language="en">Detailed animation of four-stroke engine in Adobe Flash (.swf) - Flash player required.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">motor z notranjim izgorevanjem</string>
            <string language="en">internal combustion engine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">štiritaktni motor</string>
            <string language="en">four stroke engine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">animacija</string>
            <string language="en">animation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausführliche Animation der Viertaktmaschine im 
Ziegelstein-Blitz (swf) - greller Spieler benötigte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Animation détaillée de moteur à quatre temps 
dans le flash d'adobe (swf) - joueur instantané requis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O animation detalhado do motor four-stroke no flash
do adôbe (swf) - jogador flash requereu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La animazione dettagliata del motore a quattro 
tempi nel flash dell'adobe (swf) - giocatore istantaneo ha richiesto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λεπτομερής ζωτικότητα της four-stroke μηχανής στη 
λάμψη πλίθας (σωφ) - φορέας λάμψης που απαιτείται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Animación detallada del motor de cuatro tiempos en
el flash del adobe (swf) - jugador de destello requerido.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbrennungsmotor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Maschine mit vier Anschlägen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Animation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
